name: All Humans Sux
description:
A Different planet : "All humans sux"

Greeting s , this is my game entry to the Beginner Circle Jam.  The  goal is to stop Dutch empire from colonizing our planets and save some trees in the process. 

How to play:

---------------------------------------------------------

The cursor / clock will tick, each time the full circle is complete it will and spawn the asteroid aiming for that position. Once you hear the sound of asteroid you  can move the cursor to new location. 

Use mouse click and drag to rotate the planet around.

Wind will move asteroid around, you need to offset the aiming point to take that into account.  

Hint:  watch the clouds and smoke move.

---------------------------------------------------------

Game was made in unity,  models, smoke, explosions in blender.  I was able to work on a game for few hours a day after my job. This was quite a new experience for me and demanded a lot of research, in example how to generate planets, simulate in local space, particles and more. There were also a lot of iterations on the theme, then eventually I had to settle down for one  if I wanted to make it in time. 

Thanks for trying it out
